management_items.title: Costco’s AI, tech use helps offset healthcare costs, CFO says
management_items.summary: CEO Ron Vachris highlights how pre‑scan technology speeds checkout by up to 20%, and AI is used to compare prescription drug pricing and autonomously reorder inventory, improving in‑stock rates.
key_quotes: In the warehouse implementation of scanning memberships at entry, the Costco Digital Wallet and pre‑scanning small‑ to medium‑sized baskets is leading to better member experience and improved productivity.
This is not “technology for technology’s sake” but rather that the club retailer is using tech to improve its operational efficiency.
management_items.relevance_reason: Demonstrates Costco’s commitment to AI‑driven operational efficiency and customer experience—key areas where Presti’s AI‑generated visuals could integrate into digital workflows.
sales_insights: Position Presti as a tool that enhances digital workflows and operational efficiency.
Highlight how AI‑generated imagery can integrate into automated systems like digital wallets or pre‑scan interfaces.
Emphasize efficiency gains and member experience improvements via visual automation.

management_items.title: Costco ecommerce sales growth tops 20% in Q1
management_items.summary: CEO Ron Vachris outlines Costco’s digital vision to make shopping easier, faster, and more personal, citing digital wallet, pre‑scanning baskets, AI in pharmacy, personalization, and strong ecommerce growth of 20.5% in Q1 FY2026.
key_quotes: We aim to make the shopping at Costco easier, faster and more personal, no matter where or how our members choose to shop.

This isn’t about technology for technology’s sake. It’s about using technology to strengthen the fundamentals that makes Costco who we are, increasing member loyalty, driving top‑line sales and improving efficiency in our operations so that we can bring goods to market at the lowest possible price.
management_items.relevance_reason: Clear articulation of digital personalization and AI‑driven member experience—ideal entry point for Presti’s AI‑based visual content to support personalization and digital engagement.
sales_insights: Frame Presti as enhancing personalization in ecommerce visuals.
Emphasize how AI imagery supports loyalty and member engagement.
Tie Presti’s capabilities to Costco’s goal of making shopping faster and more personal.

key_quotes: At Saks Global, we’re working to reinvent luxury shopping by delivering luxury fashion and experiences perfectly curated for each customer.
A key insight from the Saks Global Luxury Pulse is the luxury consumer’s increasing willingness to embrace personalization and AI.
management_items.relevance_reason: Reveals consumer openness to AI and personalization—supports Presti’s positioning around AI‑generated lifestyle visuals.
sales_insights: Use consumer data to argue for visual personalization adoption.
Frame Presti as meeting rising consumer expectations for AI‑driven imagery.
Leverage stats (94% engagement) to justify investment in visual AI.

management_items.title: Saks Global And Authentic Seek To Take Control Of Luxury Market
management_items.summary: Richard Baker discusses the joint venture with Authentic Brands Group to expand into retail, hospitality, and branded residences, leveraging data and distribution to shift power from vendors to retailer.
key_quotes: When we sit here in five years luxury is going to be natural on Amazon.
We also had to right size our vendor matrix, because we had 2,660 vendors and we had to reset vendor relationships.
management_items.relevance_reason: Highlights strategic shift toward controlled brands and global expansion—Presti can support scalable visual content across new channels and markets.
sales_insights: Pitch Presti as enabling consistent brand imagery across new hospitality/residence channels.
Emphasize ability to support controlled-brand strategy with scalable visuals.
Offer global deployment of lifestyle imagery aligned with expansion.

management_items.title: The Saks‑Neiman merger is on
management_items.summary: Marc Metrick outlines the merger of Saks and Neiman Marcus into Saks Global, with ambitions for international expansion and a new leadership structure including Emily Essner as President & CCO.
key_quotes: This is just the beginning, hinting at Saks Global’s future international ambitions.
management_items.relevance_reason: Merger creates scale and complexity—Presti can offer unified visual content across merged brands and geographies.
sales_insights: Position Presti as a unifying visual solution across merged brand portfolio.
Highlight ability to support international rollout with scalable imagery.
Emphasize efficiency in content generation post‑merger.

management_items.title: Saks Launches Media Network Connecting Brand Partners with Luxury Shoppers, Enhancing Product Discovery
management_items.summary: Kristin Maa introduces the Saks Media Network, a retail media platform leveraging first‑party data to enable brands to advertise via sponsored ads and display banners across Saks.com.
key_quotes: With the launch of our Saks Media Network, we are expanding our offerings for brand partners by helping their products reach the right luxury customers when and where they are actively looking to purchase.
management_items.relevance_reason: Shows investment in digital advertising and brand partner tools—Presti can integrate with media network to supply visual assets for sponsored placements.
sales_insights: Propose Presti as a visual content provider for sponsored product ads.
Highlight synergy between AI imagery and retail media performance.
Offer fast turnaround for campaign visuals.

management_items.title: Saks Global Unveils Strategy for the Future of Luxury Menswear
management_items.executive_title: President & Chief Commercial Officer, Saks Global
management_items.summary: Emily Essner describes a data‑driven strategy for luxury menswear, targeting Gen Z and Millennials with curated assortments and stylists to build modern wardrobes, aligned with 'The Art of You' vision.
key_quotes: With the scale of our multi‑brand platform, deep customer insights, refined product assortment and personalized service, we are uniquely positioned to lead the luxury menswear category.
management_items.relevance_reason: Focus on curated visual storytelling for menswear—Presti can supply lifestyle imagery tailored to Gen Z/Millennial aesthetics.
sales_insights: Offer Presti’s ability to generate modern menswear visuals for digital campaigns.
Highlight customization for younger consumer segments.
Support stylists with scalable visual assets.

management_items.title: Saks Global | Strategy – The Art of You
management_items.summary: Saks Global’s strategic pillars: portfolio, people, platform, partnerships—emphasizing data, AI, personalization, and leveraging iconic brands to deliver unique luxury experiences.
management_items.relevance_reason: Clarifies strategic framework—Presti aligns with platform and personalization pillars by offering AI‑driven visual capabilities.
sales_insights: Frame Presti as enabling the 'platform' pillar with AI imagery.
Position as a partnership enhancing personalization.
Tie into portfolio scale across brands.

management_items.title: Generative AI hits a fashion acceleration point
management_items.summary: Vogue Business reports that retailers including Saks Fifth Avenue are adopting generative AI for personalized marketing, product search, and customer service, boosting engagement and conversion.
management_items.relevance_reason: Confirms Saks’ broader adoption of generative AI—supports Presti’s relevance in AI‑driven visual content.
sales_insights: Use industry trend to validate Presti’s AI imagery solution.
Position Presti as part of generative AI wave in luxury retail.
Highlight competitive advantage through visual AI.

management_items.title: MillerKnoll Unveils New Sustainability Strategy and Issues 2024 Better World Report
management_items.summary: CEO Andi Owen outlines a bold sustainability strategy focused on carbon reduction, sustainable materials, and circularity, with net-zero by 2050 and short-term targets like PFAS elimination and renewable electricity.
key_quotes: Climate change is an urgent, global challenge, and at MillerKnoll, we are taking bold steps to drive change.
Our associates are working with our partners, suppliers, and customers to further improve the sustainability of our processes, products, and the spaces we design.
management_items.relevance_reason: Sustainability is a strategic priority; Presti’s AI imagery can support showcasing eco-friendly products and circular design initiatives.
sales_insights: Position Presti as a tool to visually communicate sustainability credentials (e.g., recycled materials, low-carbon products).
Offer scalable lifestyle imagery that highlights circularity and longevity of products.
Emphasize ability to generate visuals for PFAS-free and renewable-energy-aligned product lines.

management_items.title: MillerKnoll Issues 2023 Better World Report, Detailing Strides to Design a Better World
management_items.summary: CEO Andi Owen emphasizes MillerKnoll’s commitment to sustainability, DEIB, and community impact, including packaging waste reduction, diverse supplier spend, and volunteering.
key_quotes: As a collective of brands, we have a real opportunity to create a more equitable, diverse, and inclusive environment and to protect the planet we share; an opportunity that we're seizing.
management_items.relevance_reason: Highlights brand values and sustainability—Presti can support inclusive and eco-conscious visual storytelling.
sales_insights: Offer imagery that reflects diversity and inclusion in lifestyle contexts.
Highlight sustainable packaging and materials visually.
Align Presti’s visuals with MillerKnoll’s DEIB and community values.

management_items.title: Building a customer‑centric and digitally enabled business model
management_items.summary: MillerKnoll is integrating systems, simplifying architecture, expanding global eCommerce, harnessing data, and accelerating automation and Manufacturing 4.0 to build a digitally enabled, customer‑centric model.
key_quotes: Building a customer‑centric and digitally enabled business model is foundational to bringing MillerKnoll to life.

Our goals include integrating our systems and processes, shifting to a simpler systems architecture, serving our customers around the world through global eCommerce capabilities, harnessing data to enable our teams to make effective and timely decisions.
management_items.relevance_reason: Digital enablement and eCommerce are strategic priorities—Presti’s scalable imagery can support digital catalogs and online merchandising.
sales_insights: Pitch Presti as a way to accelerate eCommerce content creation globally.
Emphasize integration with digital systems and data-driven content workflows.
Support automation of visual content for product launches and dealer networks.

management_items.title: MillerKnoll, Inc. Reports Third Quarter Fiscal 2023 Results
management_items.summary: MillerKnoll highlights digital capabilities and dealer tools to help dealers sell the collective of brands, capturing integration synergies and improving productivity.
key_quotes: Positioning for the future, we are further enhancing our selling and digital tools to make it easier for our dealers to sell the entire MillerKnoll collective of brands.
management_items.relevance_reason: Dealer enablement and digital tools are key—Presti can offer imagery solutions for dealer portals and brand consistency.
sales_insights: Offer Presti as a tool for dealers to access consistent, high-quality lifestyle visuals.
Support cross-brand imagery for integrated brand selling.
Enable faster content updates across dealer networks.

management_items.title: MillerKnoll Trailblazes Toward Chemical‑Free Furniture
management_items.summary: MillerKnoll will eliminate PFAS from all North American products starting May, becoming the first office furniture manufacturer to do so, reinforcing its commitment to safe, sustainable design.
key_quotes: Beginning in May, all its North American products ... will be made without the addition of per‑ and poly‑fluoroalkyl substances (PFAS).
management_items.relevance_reason: PFAS‑free products are a sustainability differentiator—Presti can help visually communicate this safety and eco‑friendly positioning.
sales_insights: Provide imagery that highlights chemical‑free product features.
Support marketing around health and safety credentials.
Visualize product materials and eco‑friendly attributes.

management_items.title: MillerKnoll Announces 2030 Sustainability Goals: Doing More for Our Planet
management_items.summary: MillerKnoll sets 2030 sustainability targets: reduce carbon footprint by 50%, eliminate single‑use plastics, and use 50%+ recycled content globally, building on legacy brands.
key_quotes: Reduce the carbon footprint from its products and operations by 50% and aim to reduce the carbon footprint of its suppliers.
management_items.relevance_reason: Long‑term sustainability goals reinforce visual storytelling needs—Presti can support imagery aligned with eco‑materials and recycled content.
sales_insights: Create visuals emphasizing recycled and sustainable materials.
Support storytelling around plastic reduction and eco‑design.
Align imagery with long‑term sustainability messaging.

management_items.title: Mission Statement, Vision, & Core Values (2025) of MillerKnoll, Inc. (MLKN)
management_items.summary: MillerKnoll emphasizes environmental stewardship, circular economy, innovation, renewable energy, and R&D investment (~$50M) as part of its vision and values.
key_quotes: Driving Innovation is a cornerstone of MillerKnoll's vision.
These efforts are reflected in their environmental stewardship, such as reducing carbon footprint and promoting circular economy principles.
management_items.relevance_reason: Innovation and R&D are strategic pillars—Presti can position itself as an innovative visual technology partner.
sales_insights: Pitch Presti as an innovation partner aligned with MillerKnoll’s R&D focus.
Highlight AI‑driven imagery as cutting‑edge design support.
Emphasize alignment with circular economy and environmental values.

management_items.title: What is Sales and Marketing Strategy of MillerKnoll Company?
management_items.summary: MillerKnoll’s marketing strategy includes a direct‑to‑client sales force, expanded e‑commerce (120% traffic growth), flagship showrooms, content authority via 'Why' publication, and sustainability as USP.
key_quotes: The e‑commerce platform saw a 120% growth in traffic following a 2024 site redesign.
The digital publication 'Why' is the cornerstone, attracting over 5 million annual unique visitors.
management_items.relevance_reason: E‑commerce and content leadership are priorities—Presti can support digital content scale and storytelling via imagery.
sales_insights: Offer Presti to fuel 'Why' and other digital content with scalable visuals.
Support e‑commerce growth with high‑volume lifestyle imagery.
Enable showroom and online consistency through visual assets.

management_items.title: Jonathan Louis CEO: Latest furniture launch is ‘turning point’
management_items.summary: Javier Sanchez frames the launch of the new luxury upholstery brand Casae as both a celebration of heritage and a strategic pivot toward design‑forward, collaborative offerings targeting e‑commerce platforms, retailers, and interior designers.
key_quotes: “This launch is both a celebration and a turning point.”
“Casae speaks to the next generation of design leaders; those who seek identity and intention in the pieces they specify.”
management_items.relevance_reason: CEO emphasizes design‑forward, customizable offerings and e‑commerce platforms—key areas where Presti’s AI‑generated lifestyle imagery can support scale and storytelling.
sales_insights: Position Presti as enabling visual storytelling for Casae’s artisanal collections.
Highlight ability to generate high‑quality lifestyle images for e‑commerce launch campaigns.
Emphasize speed and flexibility to support next‑generation design‑driven brand identity.

management_items.title: Jonathan Louis launches luxury upholstery brand to celebrate 40th anniversary
management_items.summary: Heidi Gonzalez describes Casae as a collaborative, artisanal design studio aimed at co‑creating with partners and serving style‑driven retailers, e‑commerce platforms, and interior designers.
key_quotes: “Casae was born from our enduring passion for design and deep respect for the craft.”
“It’s a collaborative space where timeless craftsmanship meets forward‑thinking design. We’re here to co‑create with our partners.”
management_items.relevance_reason: Product development leader emphasizes collaboration and co‑creation with partners—Presti can support by offering scalable visual content to co‑create digital experiences.
sales_insights: Offer Presti as a tool for co‑creation of visual assets with retail and design partners.
Propose pilot for Casae collections to generate lifestyle imagery for e‑commerce and B2B presentations.
Highlight ability to reflect artisanal craftsmanship digitally at scale.

management_items.title: Innovation is colorful over at Jonathan Louis, and success is carefully crafted by design
management_items.summary: Javier Sanchez highlights Jonathan Louis’s emphasis on bold use of color, design‑led product innovation, and manufacturing flexibility to exceed expectations and support creative, custom offerings.
key_quotes: “One of the biggest things I tell my team when they are creating the product, is do not worry about costs or whether they can be bulk manufactured. What we care about is putting the best product forward.”
“Our manufacturing set up … at its heart, this is still a hand‑built product.”
management_items.relevance_reason: CEO’s focus on design innovation and flexibility aligns with Presti’s ability to create diverse, expressive visual content that matches their creative product ethos.
sales_insights: Pitch Presti as a visual extension of their design innovation—capturing bold colors and custom configurations.
Emphasize ability to reflect handcrafted feel digitally.
Support marketing of unique, statement pieces with high‑impact imagery.

management_items.title: Kimball International Named One of America’s Most Responsible Companies
management_items.summary: CEO Kristie Juster emphasizes the company’s long-standing values and commitment to sustainability and corporate responsibility, highlighting that these principles guide how they do business.
key_quotes: For more than 70 years, Kimball International’s strong values have guided our belief in doing what’s right, not only for the communities we serve, but to make a positive impact on the world.
We’re honored to be named one of America’s Most Responsible Companies because corporate responsibility has always been embedded in our purpose and how we do business.
management_items.relevance_reason: Highlights CEO’s emphasis on values and sustainability, which may align with Presti’s value proposition around responsible, scalable content creation.
sales_insights: Position Presti as a partner that supports sustainability through digital content, reducing physical sample waste.

Leverage Presti’s scalable digital imagery to reinforce Kimball’s responsible brand image.

management_items.title: Kimball International Launches New Web Experience
management_items.summary: COO Kourtney Smith discusses the launch of a modern, accessible website and dealer portal, emphasizing improved customer experience, ADA compliance, and digital tools like a product configurator.
key_quotes: We are incredibly proud of this investment in technology and the enhanced experience we are bringing our customers.
The new website and customer tools bring our Workplace and Health brands together in perfect harmony across our key vertical markets.
management_items.relevance_reason: Demonstrates strategic focus on digital customer experience and configurator tools—areas where Presti’s AI-driven imagery could integrate.
sales_insights: Pitch Presti as a way to enrich the product configurator with lifestyle imagery.

management_items.summary: Jessica Gubbins highlights recognition for innovative product designs (EverySpace and Ezzeri), emphasizing adaptability, user-centric design, and transforming environments.

These innovative products help transform workspaces and healthcare environments to fit the ever-changing needs of those that use them, ultimately creating personal connections within those spaces.

sales_insights: Offer Presti’s imagery to visually communicate product innovation and adaptability.

management_items.title: HNI Corporation to Acquire Kimball International
management_items.summary: CEO Kristie Juster frames the acquisition by HNI as a strategic next step, emphasizing shared values, expanded opportunities for employees, and enhanced value for stakeholders.
key_quotes: I’m incredibly proud of what we have built at Kimball International, and this agreement is a testament to our team’s commitment and dedication.

Joining HNI is an important next step in our company’s history and will provide our employees with more opportunities for career growth and development as part of a larger, more diversified industry leader that also shares our deeply rooted values.
management_items.relevance_reason: Provides insight into leadership’s strategic vision around growth and integration—useful for positioning Presti in a post-acquisition context.
sales_insights: Frame Presti as a scalable solution that supports integration and unified brand experience post-acquisition.
